alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Greenville; Oconee; Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 29 at 11:48PM EST until December 30 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 571 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 AM EST THURSDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA ELBERT FRANKLIN HABERSHAM HART RABUN STEPHENS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA HENDERSON TRANSYLVANIA IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA ANDERSON GREENVILLE OCONEE PICKENS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDERSON, BALDWIN, BEREA, BOYDVILLE, BREVARD, CANON, CEDAR MOUNTAIN, CLARKESVILLE, CLAYTON, CLEMSON, CORNELIA, DACUSVILLE, DANA, DEMOREST, EASLEY, EAST FLAT ROCK, ELBERTON, ETOWAH, FLETCHER, FORK SHOALS, FORTSONIA, FRANKLIN SPRINGS, GREENVILLE, GREER, GUMLOG, HARTWELL, HENDERSONVILLE, HOLLYWOOD, LAVONIA, LITTLE RIVER, MAULDIN, MIDDLETON, MOUNTAIN CITY, MOUNTAIN REST, NUBERG, OAKWAY, PINE MOUNTAIN, REED CREEK, ROYSTON, RUCKERSVILLE, SENECA, SIMPSONVILLE, TAYLORS, TOCCOA, TUXEDO, WALHALLA, AND WESTMINSTER.
